item.title: Girl Geek dinner
item.description: Lady Barcampers - the Girl Geek Dinner is happening the night before Barcamp Cork III. WHEN: Friday, November 13th at 8pm WHERE: Gourmet Burger Bistro, 8 Bridge Street, Cork city. http://www.gourmetburgerbistro.ie HOW MUCH: €18 / person for starters, your choice of burger/chicken/falafel, dessert, tea/coffee. Table booked for 8 and there’s a bar next door.. Head over to theofficial Girl Geek Dinner website and leave a comment if you can attend.
